item.description: Dartmouth is having its first ever night game on Saturday Oct 1st. Obviously a meetup there would involve getting tickets together etc.. So this is a show of interest suggestion. If we get 4-8 folks, I'll pull the trigger on tickets (if available). I think we should get a show of interest by this Friday at noon and go from there. I have the day off and will be on campus later that day for a movie and could look into tickets at that time. So RSVP if interested. Day hikes should be over by then. This will provide a great opp to stiffen those muscles up (if the drive hadn't already)

group.name: Lebanon/White River Junction Hiking Meetup Group

item.name: Night Football: Dartmouth vs. Penn, Sat 6pm
